text: Jean Tiberi (30 January 1935 â€“ 27 May 2025) was a French politician. He was Mayor of Paris from 22 May 1995 to 24 March 2001. He was mayor of the 5th arrondissement of Paris and deputy to the French National Assembly from the second district of Paris.CV at National Assembly website . He was born in Paris, France. Tiberi died on 27 May 2025 in Paris at the age of 90.Jean Tiberi, ancien maire de Paris, est mort ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Mayors of Paris
title: Jean Tiberi
